content: Jet lag is no joke! Tried sketching at 3 AM, but sleep won. Did manage to plan a family art trip in NYC though. Who knew my sleep-deprived brain could be so productive?
raw_content: "Jet lag from Japan to NYC is real! I tried setting up my art supplies at 3 AM, thinking it was the perfect time to sketch. Spoiler: it wasn't. But hey, I did manage to organize a family reunion trip to explore NYC's art scene together. Who knew my sleep-deprived brain could plan so well?"
